headline: Datadog: Looking For Bargains As The Bubble Pops
summary: Datadog has been a victim of a bursting of the tech bubble. Despite a deceleration in growth rates, DDOG's long-term growth potential remains strong. I see a buying opportunity in the stock.

headline: 2 Artificial Intelligence (AI) Stocks to Buy Before They Soar 82% and 124%, According to Certain Wall Street Analysts
summary: These two companies are compelling bargains amid the current sell-off in AI stocks.
